title: Personal Finance Tracker
description: A modern, responsive web application that helps users track their personal income and expenses with visual analytics.
detailedDescription: Built a comprehensive financial management tool with interactive pie charts showing expense breakdown by category. The app provides an intuitive interface for managing financial transactions and gaining insights into spending patterns through interactive charts. Features include real-time expense analytics, dark/light mode toggle, and responsive design that works seamlessly on desktop and mobile devices.
outcomes: Modern, user-friendly web application with current best practices in frontend development, data visualization, and responsive design. Demonstrates full-stack development capabilities and modern web development practices.

title: E-Commerce Website
description: A full-featured online shopping platform with product catalog, shopping cart, and secure checkout.
detailedDescription: Built the frontend store experience, payment integration, and backend inventory handling.
outcomes: Responsive design, secure checkout workflow, and inventory management (metrics editable).
